YourNavigation

A class for routing with OpenLayers and Gosmore Requires: jQuery OpenLayers

Summary

clearReset the Route Object to an empty array with only a start and end Waypoint

reverseReverse the Waypoints[] collection and redraw the route
YourNavigation.Waypoint
Functions
drawDraw a Waypoint on the Markers Layer
destroyRemove Waypoint from the Markers Layer and destroy it’s location information
Segment
Functions
calculateConstruct the url to retrieve a route from gosmore and do the AJAX call
createCreate a route from the kml file returned from the gosmore service
altitudeProfileGenerate the altitude profile, requires altitude service
drawDraw the segment on the route layer
directionsGet directions for the segment

Functions

Lookup

YourNavigation.Lookup = function(value,
wp,
callback)

Parameters

valuevalue to lookup (string)
wpwaypoint to place when lookup is succesfull (object)
callbackPass a function to handle the result message

Returns

on success’OK’
on failureError message

Export

YourNavigation.Export = function()

Parameters

Returns

NameFinder

YourNavigation.NameFinder = function(xml,
wp)

Parameters

xmlfile in xml format returned from a namefinder service
wpWaypoint that will be matched when a valid location is found in the xml

Returns

on success’OK’ and Waypoint with location, drawn on Waypoints Layer
on failureError message

Functions and Properties

new YourNavigation.Route(map)

Constructor for a new YourNavigation.Route instance.

Parameters

map{String} OpenLayers.Map

http://dev.openlayers.org/releases/OpenLayers-2.8/doc/apidocs/files/OpenLayers/Map-js.html#OpenLayers.Map.OpenLayers.Map

Examples

// create a map and draw a simple route
var MyFirstMap = new OpenLayers.Map('map');
var ol_wms = new OpenLayers.Layer.WMS(
          "OpenLayers WMS",
          "http://labs.metacarta.com/wms/vmap0",
          {layers: 'basic'}
      );
MyFirstMap.addLayers([ol_wms]);
MyFirstMap.addControl(new OpenLayers.Control.LayerSwitcher());

MyFirstMap.zoomToMaxExtent();
MyFirstRoute = new YourNavigation.Route(MyFirstMap);
var flat=51.158883504779;
var flon=3.220214843821;
var tlat=51.241492039675;
var tlon=4.472656250021;
MyFirstRoute.waypoint("from").lonlat = new OpenLayers.LonLat(flon,flat);
MyFirstRoute.waypoint("to").lonlat = new OpenLayers.LonLat(tlon,tlat);
MyFirstRoute.draw(MyCallBack);

//display the response from the route request:
function MyCallBack(response) {
  alert(response);
}

YourNavigation.Route.parameters

{ Array } with parameters for calculating the route

YourNavigation.Route.parameters.fast

Method for route calculation

0shortest route
1fastest route (default)

YourNavigation.Route.parameters.type

Type of transportation to use for calculation

motorcarrouting for regular cars (default)
hvgHeavy goods, routing for trucks
psvPublic transport, routing using public transport
bicyclerouting using bicycle
footrouting on foot

YourNavigation.Route.waypoint(id)

Parameters

id(optional) { integer } or { string } “from” or “to”

describing what waypoint to get from the Waypoints collection

Returns

YourNavigation.Waypoint

reset

Initialize a Route Object

clear

this.clear = function()

Reset the Route Object to an empty array with only a start and end Waypoint

draw

this.draw = function(callback)

Try to draw a route with the Waypoints[] collection

Parameters

callbackPass a function to handle the result message

reverse

this.reverse = function(callback)

Reverse the Waypoints[] collection and redraw the route

Parameters

callbackPass a function to handle the result message

YourNavigation.Waypoint

Parameters

typeType of waypoint, can be one of from/to/via
labelLabel returned from namefinder or entered by user
positionPosition of the waypoint in the route sequence.  0 = startpoint highest val = endpoint lonlat -OpenLayers.LonLat object holding the waypoints position
Summary
Functions
drawDraw a Waypoint on the Markers Layer
destroyRemove Waypoint from the Markers Layer and destroy it’s location information

Parameters

OpenLayers.LonLat

this.destroy = function()

Remove Waypoint from the Markers Layer and destroy it’s location information

Segment

Parameters

starta Waypoint Object that initializes the start of the segment
enda Waypoint Object that initializes the end of the segment
distancethe total length of this segment
parametersget the routing parameters from the gui
urlurl to have a gosmore instance return the route
permalinkthe permalink for this segment
